title: Research
text:
Married Womenâ€™s Wage Share and Household Dietary Quality
With Shenggen Fan and Qiran Zhao.
Examines how changes in married womenâ€™s contribution to household earnings affect dietary quality.
The analysis exploits regional variation in minimum wage policies as an instrumental variable.
The Effects of Chinaâ€™s Minimum Wage: Who Thrives and Who Struggles Among Rural Migrant Workers?
With Qiran Zhao and Shenggen Fan.
Investigates how the introduction and periodic adjustment of minimum wage regulations influence the employment, earnings, and well-being of rural migrant workers.
